Name: Access Resource
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Allow a visitor or a guest to access to selected private resources.

Name: Advanced Search Plus
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add some fields to the advanced search form (before/after creation date, has media, media type, etc.).

Name: Alt Text
Author: John Flatness
Description: Customize alt text for media

Name: Amazon S3 Storage
Author: Jared Howland
Description: Omeka S Storage module for Amazon S3 based on the official AWS SDK.

Name: Amazon S3
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Files store that integrates with Amazon S3.

Name: Analytics Snippet - Piwik / Matomo
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Submodule for Analytics Snippet to track json (in particular Omeka S API) and xml (like with OAI-PMH Repository) calls with Piwik / Matomo.

Name: Analytics Snippet
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add a snippet, generally a javascript tracker, at the end of the public or admin pages, and allows to track json and xml requests.

Name: Annotate
Author: Daniel Berthereau for EHESS
Description: Implement the W3C Web Annotation Ontology to let users annotate, tag, comment, rate, highlight, draw, etc. any resource in a normalized way.
Tags: annotation, tag, comment, rating, w3c recommendation, linked data

Name: Annotate images and maps (Cartography)
Author: Daniel Berthereau for EHESS
Description: Allows to annotate images and to locate data on standard wms maps with the w3c web annotation data model and vocabulary.

Name: Any Cloud
Author: Jared Howland
Description: Omeka S module for storing items in the cloud storage of your choice.
Tags: amazon s3 aws, wasabi, azure, digital ocean, dropbox, google, rackspace, scaleway, storage, file system

Name: Api Info
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Gives access to some infos about Omeka sites and resources, that are not available in the default api, mainly for external apps.

Name: Archive Folder
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Automatically import a local or remote folder into Omeka as collections, items, files, and metadata.

Name: Archive Repertory
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Keeps original names of imported files and put them in a hierarchical structure (collection / item / files) in order to get readable urls for files and to avoid an overloading of the file server.

Name: Ark
Author: BibLibre
Description: Create short, unique, meaningless, universal and persistent identifiers (ark and/or noid) and use them as urls for records.

Name: Banner Image
Author: UVA Library Scholars' Lab
Description: Display banner image into pages

Name: Base
Author: Pols12
Description: Base of a module to execute a script.

Name: Basket
Description: Allow user to add basket

Name: Bibliography
Author: Daniel Berthereau for Collegium Musicæ of Sorbonne Université
Description: Manage a bibliography with standard citations, reference lists, suggested values, and collected records from doi, isbn and other identifiers.
Tags: citation, csl, bibliography, doi, isbn, lccn, oclc, olid, fabio

Name: Block Plus
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add some new blocks for the static pages and improve some of the existing ones.

Name: Blocks Disposition
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Manage automatic display of features of the modules in the resource pages.

Name: Bulk Check
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Check metadata of resources and files.

Name: Bulk Edit
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Add search and replace functionality allowing curators to update and clean metadata over many resources quickly and easily.

Name: Bulk Export
Author: Daniel Berthereau (inspired from a classic plugin of BibLibre)

Name: Bulk Import Files
Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Import files in bulk with their internal metadata (exif, iptc and xmp for images, audio and video, pdf, etc.).

Name: Bulk Import
Author: Daniel Berthereau (inspired from a classic plugin of BibLibre)
Description: Extensible bulk import module.

Name: Clean Url
Author: Daniel Berthereau, Omeka S port by BibLibre
Description: Displays clean, seo and readable URLs like https://example.org/first_collection/dc:identifier, with or without site slug.

Name: COinS
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media (Omeka S port by BibLibre)

Name: Collecting
Author: Omeka Team
Description: Add collecting forms to your sites.

Name: Column Maker
Author: Cu La
Description: Add some columns to the page without invoking the HTML module

Name: Comment
Author: Daniel Berthereau (port and improvement from the RRCHNM Omeka Classic plugin)

Description: Add a site page block with a ”Contact us” form, and a link to report an issue on a resource.

Author: Daniel Berthereau
Description: Allow guest users or visitors identified by a token to correct and complete metadata of a resource in the public side.

Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media

Name: CSS Editor
Author: Roy Rosenzweig Center for History and New Media, upgraded by BibLibre and Daniel Berthereau

Name: CSSEditor
Author: Omeka Team

Name: CSV Import
Author: Omeka Team and Daniel Berthereau

Name: Custom Advanced Search
Author: Omeka Team
Description: Customize the advanced search form

Name: Custom Ontology

Name: Custom Vocab
Author: Omeka Team

Name: DataScribe

Author: Omeka Team

Author: Omeka Team

Enabling Mroonga engine for CJK-ready full-text search. Mroonga plugin for MySQL or MariaDB must be installed and configured.

Enabling MySQL's N-gram tokenizer for CJK full-text search. This module is only suitable for MySQL 5.7 or later. If you use MariaDB, please try 'Mroonga search' instead.
WARNING: Backup the database before installing this module.
